## Installation

You can install the development version of spheregr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ChristofSch/spheregr")
```

## Info

The folder `article_scripts` contains all R-scripts needed to create the figures and tables of the article *Regression in Nonstandard Spaces with Fr√©chet and Geodesic Approaches*. The execution of the simulation studies may take several hours (up to a few days).
